code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ExpenseForm(_ref){let{addExpense}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(name&&description&&amount){const newExpense={id:Date.now(),name,description,amount:parseFloat(amount)};addExpense(newExpense);setName('');setDescription('');setAmount('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,style:{marginBottom:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Expense name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Description",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Amount",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Expense"})]});}export default ExpenseForm;
